title: Economy in Los Angeles
abstract: Los Angeles is a major economic hub in the United States (US). The city is home to many large corporations, such as Disney, Warner Bros., and Universal Studios. Los Angeles is also known for its diverse economy, with industries such as entertainment, technology, and tourism. Explore some of the different industries that drive the economy in Los Angeles.

industries.title: Entertainment
industries.description: Los Angeles is a major center for enterinment. Many popular series and movies you see today were commenced in Los Angeles. You'll see various actors you've seen on TV in the city. The city is home to Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, and many other famous actors. Los Angeles is also known for its vibrant music scene, with many famous musicians calling the city home.

industries.title: Technology
industries.description: Los Angeles is a major technology hub in the US. The city is home to many large technology companies, such as Google, Facebook, and Snapchat. Los Angeles is also known for its startup scene, with many new companies being founded every year.

industries.title: Tourism
industries.description: Los Angeles is a large tourist destination in the US. The city is home to many famous attractions, such as the Hollywood Walk of Fame, the Griffith Observatory, and the Getty Center. Los Angeles is also known for its beautiful beaches, such as Venice Beach, Santa Monica Beach, and Malibu Beach.

industries.title: Fashion
industries.description: Los Angeles is a major fashion hub in the US. The city is home to many famous fashion designers, such as Michael Kors, and Calvin Klein. Los Angeles is also known for its huge fashion scene, with many fashion shows and events being held every year.

destinations.title: Downtown Los Angeles
destinations.description: Downtown Los Angeles is the central business district of LA. Downtown Los Angeles is also known for its vibrant nightlife, with many bars, clubs, and restaurants to choose from. This destination is great for those who are looking to experience the inner city life of Los Angeles.
